Reviews_Description: This is a great car in this segment, and it is good for family purposes. It has a very nice interior and the performance is also good.
Hyundai Creta is an awesome car, its overall performance is the best & mileage is also very good. It is the Best car in the SUV segment.

Creta is the best car in SUV Segment. There is a bluelink with voice commands that using for calling, opening the sunroof, turning off and on ac, etc. It has the best comfortable seats. Its engine has one push button to start smoothly and takes over up to 220 km/h. It connects with Android Auto and CarPlay quickly. It has cool air ventilated seats.

Rating_Title: Good Car But Cluch Plate Is Not Good
Reviews_Description: This is a good car with nice functions, bluelink, but sometimes not working. It is a comfortable car for long journeys and could have wireless auto car play. The Mattel used not so good, and cluch plate is also not good.
This is a very nice car, it's comfortable while driving and it has good safety features. It gives good mileage in the city and highways also.
It is very comfortable and smooth to drive a car. Its pickup and road grip is excellent, and the exterior looks so nice.
A normal car has ventilated seat. It's a better performance car, but does not have rear ac vents and mileage is good for this car. The speed is also better, and I like this Hyundai Creta.
Great for long drives. The mileage is too good. Good looking car and a more spacious car. Just go for it.
The comfort that Creta has provided me, especially on long journeys is commendable. Also, it is a very fuel-efficient car with diesel. Styling and sharpness is the key to its success.

Hyundai Creta is the best SUV car for a long drive. This car gives the best performance, performance is so good, and luxurious feeling in the vehicle. I love Creta buying experience is so good and but it's expensive.
This is the primus SUV. It fully loaded the featured car with the best engine performance. Best in seating arrangement while traveling.
Dashboard styling could have been better, below the infotainment system the design feels like something is missing. Overall the car has got a good interior.

The Creta 2020 is stunning in all aspects! In terms of design, comfort, power, and mileage it is the leader. It is by far the best SUV iv ever driven. Absolutely no driving fatigue, excellent tech features, and overall a brilliant. I thank myself for deciding on buying the Creta 2020 version
Best car in the segment with good mileage for Indian road conditions, and low maintenance. Its riding quality and features are also good at this price.

Overall look wise it's a good car. Also fits within budget but the downside is that it has the worst brake in its segment. Every time an emergency brake produces a clattering sound and the car doesn't stop at the required distance. The mileage is good. I got a mileage of around 15-16kmpl in city and 20-22kmpl on highway.
Creta is a very good-looking SUV and has a good sunroof. This is a powerful car with nice features.

Rating_Title: Hyundai Creta Is An Awesome Car
Reviews_Description: The Hyundai Creta is an awesome car in the indian market. Its built quality is very powerful, and overall safety is also good.
The Creta is looking awesome and is the best SUV in the segment, but needs to improve the mileage and safety.

This is a great car, it has amazing features with top-notch performance. The shape of the steering is too good and it looks premium. It has a wonderful music system and speakers. It is a value for money.
This car is a middle-class person's dream in affordable prices in luxury life. The Interior is a very awesome look and comfortable.
The overall driving experience is good, the performance is also amazing, and the mileage is decent enough. Only the point is safety Hyundai needs to work on this.
The overall driving experience is good, and performance is also good. The gear shifting is smooth, and the clutch is also light.
The petrol Creta lacks power on hilly roads and the suspension is not built for bad roads. Too much road noise and sounds from suspensions are also very audible on bad roads.

One of the best available options but waiting for a new car should be lesser. It not only provides a smooth drive but has all functions that make your drive smoother. Gives good stability on highways too.

Rating_Title: Hyundai Creta Is Compatible With My Family
Reviews_Description: I have the Creta EX petrol variant which is a 5-seater with dual front airbags. It is compatible with my family's use too. Also, we have a manual mode of transmission with 1497 cc. It's been around one year since we bought the car, and it is super smooth and has the best experience car. Rating_Title: One Of The Best Cars In The Segment.
Reviews_Description: One of the best cars in its segment. Complete value for money. The features are all wonderful and functional which adds to the experience. Plus the always reliable Hyundai engine which always does the job whether it be mileage or performance. All in all, if you are thinking of buying a Creat, just go for it. It is definitely worth it.

Rating_Title: Creta Is best Mid-Size SUV In This Price
Reviews_Description: This is the best mid-size SUV car in this price range. The features, performance, comfort, looks and give decent mileage on long trips.
Hyundai Creta is the most popular SUV. It's looking very dashing with a powerful engine. This car is very comfortable, easy to drive and is loaded fully with features. I love this car.
Very good performance, seating comfort, cornering stability, boot space, and premium design. Also, the beautiful design on the front and back LED lights is premium design.

Rating_Title: My Experience With Creta Is Amazing
Reviews_Description: Really happy with the driving comfort and performance of the car, the ac cooling is good and looks good on the road.
